document_data.caption: A map of Luiren showing Krenadir on the coast.
document_data.name: Krenadir
document_data.mainbody: '''Krenadir'''<ref name=tGHotR-p67/> (also seen as '''Krenalir''') was a coastal city in the [[halfling]] realm of [[Luiren]].
document_data.Geography: Krenadir was located on the coast of [[Luirenstrand]]  in the [[Great Sea]]. It was located some miles east of [[Mortick Swamp]]. A road around the swamp connected the city to Beluir and the rest of Luiren.
document_data.History: Krenadir was founded in [[218 DR]].<ref name=tGHotR-p67/> In [[1105 DR]], the city received widespread damage from a storm over the Great Sea.
document_data.Armed Forces: During the height of the harvest season 100 [[warders]] protected the city and surrounding land. Many of these Warder's were laid-off during the winter season and spent their time patrolling the [[Long Forest]] for [[Fasruil]] and [[Crimel]].
